Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Sam Bennett?

Sam Bennett is 29 years old.

When was Sam Bennett born?

Sam Bennett was born on June 20, 1996.

Where was Sam Bennett born?

Sam Bennett was born in Holland Landing, Canada.

How tall is Sam Bennett?

Sam Bennett is 6-1 (185 cm) tall.

How much does Sam Bennett weigh?

Sam Bennett weighs 193 lbs (87 kg).

How many goals does Sam Bennett have?

Sam Bennett had 25 goals last season and 162 goals over his career.

How many points does Sam Bennett have?

Sam Bennett had 51 points last season and 336 points over his career.

How many Stanley Cups has Sam Bennett won?

Sam Bennett has won 2 Stanley Cups as a player.
